item.title: The Original
item.name: The Original Cheesecake
item.content: The One that Started it All! Our Famous Creamy Cheesecake with a Graham Cracker Crust and Sour Cream Topping.

item.title: Fresh Strawberry
item.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
item.content: The Original Topped with Glazed Fresh Strawberries. Our Most Popular Flavor for 30 Years!

item.title: Toasted Marshmallow S'mores Galore™
item.name: S'mores Cheesecake
item.content: Hershey’s® Cheesecake topped with chocolate ganache. Finished with toasted housemade marshmallow, Honey Maid graham crackers and whipped cream.

item.title: OREO® Dream Extreme Cheesecake
item.name: OREO Cheesecake
item.content: OREO® Cookies baked in our creamy Cheesecake with layers of fudge cake and OREO® Cookie mousse. Topped with a milk chocolate icing. 25¢ from the sale of each slice will be donated to Feeding America, the nation’s leading domestic hunger relief charity.

item.title: Hershey®'s Chocolate Bar Cheesecake
item.name: Hershey's Cheesecake
item.content: Hershey®'s Cheesecake Between Moist Chocolate Cake with Creamy Chocolate Frosting and Chocolate Chips.

item.title: Ultimate Red Velvet Cake Cheesecake™
item.name: Red Velvet Cheesecake
item.content: Moist layers of Red Velvet Cake and our Original Cheesecake covered with our special Cheesecake Factory cream cheese frosting.

item.title: Reese's® Peanut Butter Chocolate Cake Cheesecake
item.name: Reese's Cheesecake
item.content: Chunks of Reese's® Peanut Butter Cups in our Original Cheesecake with Layers of Delicious Fudge Cake and Caramel.

item.title: Piña Colada Cake Cheesecake
item.name: Piña Colada Cheesecake
item.content: A Seasonal Favorite - Moist White Cake Layered with Original Cheesecake, Pineapple, Coconut and Rum.

item.title: 30th Anniversary Chocolate Cake Cheesecake
item.name: 30th Anniv. Cheesecake
item.content: Layers of Our Original Cheesecake, Fudge Cake and Chocolate Truffle Cream.

item.title: Godiva® Chocolate Cheesecake
item.name: Godiva Cheesecake
item.content: Layers of Flourless Godiva Chocolate Cake, Godiva Chocolate Cheesecake and Chocolate Mousse.

item.title: White Chocolate Raspberry Truffle®
item.name: White Chocolate Cheesecake
item.content: Creamy Cheesecake Swirled with White Chocolate and Raspberry.

item.title: Black - Out Cake
item.name: Blackout Cake
item.content: Our Deepest, Richest Chocolate Cake with Chocolate Chips, Finished with Almonds.

item.title: Lemoncello Cream Torte™
item.name: Lemon Cream Torte
item.content: Layers of Vanilla Cake and Lemon Mascarpone Cream Topped with Streusel and Served with Strawberries and Whipped Cream.

item.title: Caribbean Cooler
item.name: Caribbean Cooler (Drink)
item.content: Mount Gay and Malibu Rums, Island Juices and Coconut all Swirled with Strawberries.

item.title: Mojito*
item.name: Mojito (Drink)
item.content: Our Classic, with Cruzan Citrus Rum On the Rocks – A Cuban Favorite! *This Cocktail can be Prepared Skinny-Style with 150 Calories or Less

item.title: Cosmopolitan*
item.name: Cosmopolitan (Drink)
item.content: Skyy Citrus and Cointreau with a Splash of Cranberry Juice. *This Cocktail can be Prepared Skinny-Style with 150 Calories or Less

item.title: Asian Pear Martini
item.name: Asian Pear Martini (Drink)
item.content: Absolut Vanilla Vodka, Pear, Sake and Passion Fruit.

item.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
item.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
item.content: Fontina and Parmesan Cheese, Garlic and Herbs in a Wine Sauce.

item.title: Beets with Goat Cheese*
item.name: Beets with Goat Cheese
item.content: Fresh Beets, Apples, Baby Arugula & Pecans. *Featured on our SkinnyLicious™ Menu

item.title: Chicken Samosas*
item.name: Chicken Samosas
item.content: Crispy Wrappers Filled with Spiced Chicken. Served with Cilantro Dipping Sauce. *Featured on our SkinnyLicious™ Menu

item.name: Ahi Tartare
item.content: Raw Tuna with Avocado and Soy-Ginger Sesame Sauce *Featured on our SkinnyLicious™ Menu
